Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AILSAMPLECB

The function AILSAMPLECB specifies a user-defined digital audio callback.

void AILCALLBACK AILSAMPLECB(
  HSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle that generated the callback.

Discussion

This callback type can be made by several different digital audio events.


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_register_EOB_callback, AIL_register_EOF_callback, AIL_register_EOS_callback, AIL_register_SOB_callback
Related Basic Types: HSAMPLE, void
